arts.ttl: Joshua Zirkzee 'in tears' after what Man United fans did during Newcastle defeat as Ruben Amorim reacts
arts.sum: The Dutchman has endured a difficult debut season at Old Trafford after making the £36.5million switch from Bologna

arts.ttl: Newcastle United dealt Fabian Schar blow during Man United win ahead of Tottenham
arts.sum: "Then when you start to win and score goals the confidence comes back. [A] great mentality from the boys from start to finish to defend our goal and score two to win the game."

arts.ttl: Newcastle United humiliate Man United as boos heard and Ruben Amorim taunted - 5 things - Aaron Stokes - Chronicle Live
arts.sum: Newcastle United held up their end of the bargain amid a wealth of pre-match confidence at Old Trafford as they beat Manchester United in their own backyard for only the second time in the Premier League. Newcastle United starting as the bookies' favourites at Old Trafford?

arts.ttl: Casemiro fury caught on camera as Newcastle United leave Man Utd stars rattled
arts.sum: It took just four minutes for Manchester United players to begin infighting as Newcastle United started with a bang at Old Trafford on Monday evening. Almost a carbon copy of the first goal, this time it was Anthony Gordon taking Lewis Hall's place as the provider, while Joelinton was the scorer as the defence focused all their attention on making sure Isak wasn't allowed a free run at scoring his second of the half.

arts.ttl: Exclusive: Tottenham & Newcastle keen on player who could be used in ambitious Barcelona swap deal
arts.sum: Tottenham and Newcastle are among the clubs interested in Barcelona striker Vitor Roque, though he could also be used as part of a cash-plus-player deal for Sporting Lisbon star Viktor Gyokeres. Sources have informed CaughtOffside that Spurs, Newcastle, Crystal Palace and Brentford are all keeping a close eye on Roque’s situation as the young Brazilian […] The post Exclusive: Tottenham & Newcastle keen on player who could be used in ambitious Barcelona swap deal appeared first on CaughtOffside.

arts.ttl: Joshua Zirkzee 'was reduced to tears' after Man United fans jeered £36.5m star when substituted 33 minutes into Newcastle defeat - as Ruben Amorim admits the forward is 'suffering'
arts.sum: The £36.5million summer signing was brought off 33 minutes into the match, with a roar going up from the home fans as the Dutchman was brought off.

arts.ttl: Amorim on Man Utd being in a relegation battle
arts.sum: There wasn't a lot of optimism in Gary Neville's post-match comments, but he added that the only positive was Amorim getting a better look at the players he's inherited so far. The Portuguese head coach also added that it is "a bit embarrassing" to be talking about relegation when asked about it in his post-match press conference, but acknowledged that the blame should be put on him.

arts.ttl: Every word from Ruben Amorim press conference after Man Utd 0 Newcastle 2 on 30 December 2024
arts.sum: Of course, the players are not… I didn’t choose the players specifically for that position, but that I already knew, but I have to sell my idea, if I’m going to change all the time, it’s going to be even worse. So I understand what you’re saying but if I know, for sure, that changing everything is going to get us near to win games, I will do it."

arts.ttl: Isak hailed as 'best striker in the Premier League right now'
arts.sum: Alexander Isak has been labelled as the "best striker in the Premier League right now" after the Newcastle United forward delivered a sensational display in a 2-0 win against Manchester United at Old Trafford. That is the view of former Liverpool defender Jamie Carragher, who lauded the Swede after he scored for the sixth straight Premier League match and took his tally in December to eight goals, more than any other player.

arts.ttl: Isak and Joelinton star as Newcastle extend Man Utd's winless run
arts.sum: First-half headers from Alexander Isak and Joelinton kept the high-flying Magpies in fifth place, while condemning Ruben Amorim ’s side to a third successive league defeat. Newcastle United recorded their fourth straight Premier League win after a 2-0 victory over struggling Manchester United at Old Trafford.
